protein.specific_function: May be involved in the generation of reactive oxygen species (ROS). Has low NADPH-dependent naphtoquinone reductase activity, with a preference for 1,2-naphtoquinone over 1,4- naphtoquinone. Has low NADPH-dependent diamine reductase activity (in vitro)
